name: Penny Arcade - SkyCaptain Style
description: A fixed width (80em) style for the Penny-Arcade Forums that uses the default background colors, but adds borders around quotes, spoilers, and alters the color of the spoiler background.  It also fiddles around with a lot of the margins and padding around various elements to tighten them up a little and remove extraneous white space.
additional_info:
v0.2 - Removed some code that moved the Quote / Awesome / Report buttons around.  Not required now.
v0.1 - Released into the wild!
